posts.post_title: FS: T206 WALTER JOHNSON       Piedmont     Portrait      PSA 4 VG - EX  (scans)     $850
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Stephen Putman
Hello Everyone!

Up for sale is a T206 Walter Johnson Piedmont Portrait PSA 4 VG - EX. The card is in great shape and would have probably graded higher if it wasn't slightly off centered. Please email me (putman2110@yahoo.com) if you are interested. 

Price: $850 which includes insured priority shipping with delivery confirmation

Please look at the 1933 Goudey PSA Set Registry #17 "Almost There" as I will be selling my entire collection. 

Payments: PayPal, money orders (preferred), and personal checks
